title: Beyond the Horror: Apocalypse Episode 3
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment:

I found a connection that In the last episode I wanted to share and its connected to cult. The movie that meed watched in the theater is rosemary's baby and it was directed by Roman Polanski. His wife, Sharon Tate was murdered by the Manson cult. There are plenty of other antichrist movies that could have been used but it was very calculated to use this movie. Thank you for reading!
